content: back then knit into front of next 2 sts less in double moss-st k1a p1a st p1 0 0 0 1 0 0 times work 2 row working 1 st more in st-st and next row k1a p 1 0 0 1 a p 34 37 41 43 43 43 45 49 51 51 sts 1 st less in double moss-st in each row b p2togb 37 39 43 46 sts 2nd row * k1 p1 repeat from * to last st k1 work 1 row working 2 sts more in st-st and next row using b only k2tog knit to end 3rd row k1 * p1 k1 repeat from * to end 2 sts less in double moss-st 36 38 42 45 sts 4th row * p1 k1 repeat from * to last st p1 repeat last 7 row 7 times more 5th row * p1 k1 repeat from * to last st p1 for all 6 sizes shape shoulder 6th row k1 * p1 k1 repeat from * to end for all 6 sizes next row cast off 4 4 5 5 6 7 sts purl to from 3rd to 6th row sets position of double work 0 1 0 6 1 2 row working 1 st less last 2 sts p2tog 26 29 30 32 35 37 sts moss-st in double moss-st and 1 st more in st-st in each row next row k2tog knit to end working in double moss-st throughout increase 25 28 29 31 34 36 sts 1 st at each end of next and every foll next row cast off 4 5 5 6 6 7 sts purl 4th row to 61 65 67 69 71 83 sts working shape neck to last 2 2 0 0 0 0 sts p2tog 1 1 0 0 0 0 increase sts in double moss-st for 3rd 4th 5th and 6th sizes only times 20 22 24 25 28 29 sts increase 1 st at each end of every foll 6th row to next row k 38 40 44 47 b turn leave rem next row k2tog knit to end 71 73 75 79 81 85 sts working increase sts in 59 63 67 70 sts on a stitch holder 19 21 23 24 27 28 sts double moss-st working on these 38 40 44 47 sts only next row cast off 4 5 5 6 6 7 sts purl to proceed as follows - cont without shaping until sleeve measures end 15 16 18 18 21 21 sts next row p2tog purl to end next row k2tog 1 1 0 0 0 0 times knit 45 45 46 47 47 47 cm 17¾ 17¾ 18 18½ 37 39 43 46 sts to end 14 15 18 18 21 21 sts 18½ 18½ in ending with a ws row cast off in patt next row cast off 4 5 6 6 7 7 sts purl to shape neck and shoulder end 10 10 12 12 14
